Question: u-blox CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
u-blox

CES 2024

- u-safe: Collaboration with GMV for safe positioning solution in automotive applications
- Matter: Connectivity solution for smart devices across various brands and smart home ecosystems
- F9 and PointPerfect combination: Showcasing XPLR-HPG-2 GNSS evaluation kit capabilities
- SARA-R5 and Orbcomm: Integration of satellite capabilities into CEL & SAT IoT module
- 5G - Fad or Future? A Look at the Promise and Reality: Panel participation on 5G technology
- JODY-W6: Concurrent dual-band Wi-Fi 6E module with Bluetooth 5.3 for automotive use cases
Summary_cn:
优博思

CES 2024

- u-safe：与GMV合作，在汽车应用中提供安全定位解决方案
- Matter：连接解决方案，适用于跨不同品牌和智能家居生态系统的智能设备
- F9和PointPerfect组合：展示XPLR-HPG-2 GNSS评估套件的能力
- SARA-R5和Orbcomm：将卫星功能整合到CEL＆SAT物联网模块中
- 5G - Fad or Future？对5G技术的承诺与现实的展望：参与5G技术讨论小组
- JODY-W6：用于汽车用例的同时双频Wi-Fi 6E模块，配备蓝牙5.3技术
